sentences.en: A colony of gulls inhabits the island.
sentences.cn: 一群海鸥栖息于这个岛上.

sentences.en: Algeria was formerly a French colony.
sentences.cn: 阿尔及利亚以前是法国的殖民地。

sentences.en: All the bees in the colony are genetically related.
sentences.cn: 同一群体的蜜蜂都有亲缘关系.

sentences.en: As the colony prospered, stresses in the communal arrangements grew greater.
sentences.cn: 随着殖民地的繁荣, 村庄权力增大了.

sentences.en: At one time Nigeria was a British colony.
sentences.cn: 过去,尼日利亚是英国的殖民地.

sentences.en: Britain was mandated to govern the former colony of German East Africa.
sentences.cn: 英国受权代管德国在东非的前殖民地.

sentences.en: Different animals in the colony had different manifestations of the disease.
sentences.cn: 在这一群体里，这种疾病在不同的动物身上有着不同的表现。

sentences.en: He said the move would definitely stem the haemorrhage of talent and enterprise from the colony.
sentences.cn: 他表示这一举措势必会抑制殖民地人才和企业严重流失的现象。

sentences.en: In 1932, he established a school and artists' colony in Stone City, Iowa.
sentences.cn: 1932年，他在艾奥瓦州的石头城创建了一所学校，那儿成了艺术家的聚居地。

sentences.en: She spent the mid - 1940 s at the writers'colony, Yaddo, in upstate New York.
sentences.cn: 40年代 中期,她是在纽约州北部的作家庄园耶多度过的.

sentences.en: Skilful men, of the medical and chirurgical profession , were of rare occurrence in the colony.
sentences.cn: 当时在殖民地,精通内外科医术的人尚不多见.

sentences.en: The former French colony has achieved self - government .
sentences.cn: 这个前法国殖民地已获得 自治.

sentences.en: the former governor of the colony
There lived a colony of bees on the tree.
They had been the great rampart of the colony on the North.
sentences.cn: 他们一向是北部殖民地的坚强保垒.
他们住在艺术家聚居区.

words.tran_cn: 殖民主义者的；奉行殖民主义的
殖民者；殖民地居民；移民
殖民者；殖民地开拓者；移入选民；移民
开拓殖民地；移居于殖民地
将…开拓为殖民地；移于殖民地；从他地非法把选民移入

phrases.tran_cn: 菌落计数；菌落数（测定法）

trans.tran_cn: 殖民地，聚居人群，群体，(美国独立前的)北美十三州
trans.tran_en: a country or area that is under the political control of a more powerful country, usually one that is far away
